entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasley family is mentioned as the owners of a room that Percy gets to keep all to himself.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story and has a conversation with Ron about Pigwidgeon.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character who explains to Harry why he named his owl Pigwidgeon 'Pig'.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one who named Ron's owl Pigwidgeon.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is an owl that belongs to Ron and has been named by Ginny.

entities.name: errol
entities.description: Errol is another owl mentioned in the story as being annoyed by Pigwidgeon.

entities.name: hermes
entities.description: Hermes is an owl that is also mentioned as being annoyed by Pigwidgeon.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's old rat who has been eaten by Crookshanks.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is Hermione's cat that has eaten Scabbers.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character who mentions where Crookshanks is currently located.

relationships.description: Ron owns Pigwidgeon, as mentioned in the conversation between Ron and Harry.
Ginny named Pigwidgeon, according to Ron's explanation to Harry.
Crookshanks ate Scabbers, as mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Hermione.
